title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\Taxonomy
name: Taxonomy
description:
A taxonomy is a collection of hierarchical policy tags that classify data along a common axis.

For example, a "data sensitivity" taxonomy might contain the following policy tags:

+ PII
  + Account number
  + Age
  + SSN
  + Zipcode
+ Financials
  + Revenue

A "data origin" taxonomy might contain the following policy tags:

+ User data
+ Employee data
+ Partner data
+ Public data

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.Taxonomy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. Resource name of this taxonomy in URL format. Note: Policy tag manager generates unique taxonomy IDs.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. User-defined name of this taxonomy. The name can't start or end with spaces, must contain only Unicode letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, and spaces, and be at most 200 bytes long when encoded in UTF-8. The taxonomy display name must be unique within an organization.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. Description of this taxonomy. If not set, defaults to empty. The description must contain only Unicode characters, tabs, newlines, carriage returns, and page breaks, and be at most 2000 bytes long when encoded in UTF-8.

params.name: data.policy_tag_count
params.description: Output only. Number of policy tags in this taxonomy.

params.name: data.taxonomy_timestamps
params.description: Output only. Creation and modification timestamps of this taxonomy.

params.name: data.activated_policy_types
params.description: Optional. A list of policy types that are activated for this taxonomy. If not set, defaults to an empty list.
